name: Pass War
description: This extension have the will to help you with on the security of all your passwords. You can check if the password you use is safe or generate a new one. You can also check if your email adresses have been leaked or check if a domain is safe. More features will appear in the future.
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' https://ajax.googleapis.com/ https://www.googleapis.com/; object-src 'self'; script-src-elem 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://smtpjs.com/v3/smtp.js https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/2.1.3/jquery.min.js;
